name: Journey To The Subconscious Mind | Twine
name_original: Journey To The Subconscious Mind | Twine
description:
Journey To The Subconscious Mind

Have you ever wonder what is happening inside your mind during life and death situation? This interactive story is will show you whether you deserve a second life or not.

There are 7 choices that have timer in it. You have to choose your answer within 5 second to continue the game. If you don’t choose within the time frame, you will get a bad ending.

In total, there are 12 endings (9 bad endings, and 3 happy endings)

What is considered as happy ending? You get another life.

What is considered as bad ending? You are death.

It is as simple as that.

SPOILER ALERT!!! Here are some Easter egg in the story: If you get happy ending, the date was set a week after the starting point. Each timed choices indicate the important decision whether you can survive another day in real life.
